short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Empower your GitHub journey with RepoSizer: Simplify project management decisions!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unlock the Power of GitHub Repo Insights with Ease!

Are you tired of digging through endless GitHub pages to find the size of a repository? Say goodbye to the hassle with our Chrome extension!

Instant Insights: With a single click, effortlessly uncover the size of any GitHub repository directly from your browser toolbar. No more navigating through multiple tabs or commands.

Seamless Integration: Our extension seamlessly integrates into your GitHub browsing experience. Whether you're casually browsing or deeply analyzing repositories, access vital size information in an instant.

Enhanced Productivity: Streamline your workflow and boost productivity by eliminating unnecessary steps. Spend less time searching and more time building with the insights you need at your fingertips.

Tailored Convenience: Enjoy a tailored browsing experience with our extension's intuitive interface. Effortlessly access repository sizes whenever and wherever you need them.

For Public Repositories Only: Please note that this extension currently supports public repositories only.

Experience Efficiency: Experience efficiency like never before as you navigate GitHub with newfound ease. Take control of your browsing experience and unlock the potential of GitHub repositories effortlessly.

Join the Revolution: Join countless developers who have revolutionized their GitHub experience with our extension. Embrace efficiency, convenience, and productivity today!

Download now and elevate your GitHub experience to new heights!
